REASON: Effective at first, but gradually began to experience episodes of vertigo and dizziness.  Each episode became more and more severe

This medicine really helped improve my overall heart function, aided in my chronic heart failure post infarctus, and reduced my shortness of breath.  I have had virtually no negative side effects except some male breast enlargement.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR EPLERENONE: The only negative was some noticable male breast enlargement.  I am not happy with that but it is only cosmetic.  Small price to pay for the excellent benefits that this medicine has given me.  Far superior to Spiro.
